Biography.Summary: Rukmini is a Gen X adult who uses Microsoft surfaces primarily to stay current on technology—especially AI—and to browse lifestyle content. Recent activity shows strong shopping and comparison behavior around women's clothing and seasonal wardrobe items, alongside wide-ranging destination research for potential travel. She also periodically explores practical how-to topics (developer tools, API keys, recipes) and keeps an eye on major breaking news.

ActiveGoals.goal: Compare and potentially purchase wardrobe items (especially sweaters/tops) using sales and curated styling options
Shortlist destinations and gather travel logistics (e.g., park planning, international destinations, passport renewal)

LongTermGoals.goal: Stay informed about AI trends and their practical impacts

Highlights: Frequent AI and big-tech news consumption across MSN/Edge, with recurring Microsoft/Google/Meta themes.
High-intensity apparel browsing across multiple brands and sale pages, plus interest in a personal styling service.
Repeated travel and destination lookups spanning parks and international locations.
